about_the_game:
About the Audio

Some songs have not been released, for various reasons. They may be released by the artists in the future, separately from Last Broadcast. If you want to stay updated, please find and follow these artists on social media.
Finally here is a list of all the vinyl record artists and their tracks. Thanks for playing!

Intro and Outro Songs

Grace Groves (lady medea) - “deer crossing”
Ray Savord - “I’ll Be Damned”

Vinyl Song Artists

Mackin Carroll - “Anxious in the Alley”
Grace Miedziak - “Lying Eyes”
Haley Adams - “Stranded in Silence”
Grace Groves (lady medea) - “luna”
Max Hall - “When I’m Gone”
Lukas Geppert - “Fading Colors”
Calvin Butler - “The World Is Spinning”
Adam Morina and Matthew Schulman (Plant People) - “Back Home”
S8nt Elektric - “S8NT ELEKTRIC”
Jacob Rodier (Monday At Midnight) - “Beach Zombie”
Alice Luke - “Deaf & Hungry”
Christian Lising (Johann X) - “I Don’t Blame You”
Luke Sobolevitch - “Methamphetamine”
Cole Supple - “Weekend People”
